definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: It's recommended to install some flange bolts which slowly will be released to make the working with coupling more safe.
sentences.chinese: 建議安裝一些凸緣螺栓，它能保證聯軸節工作更安全。

sentences.english: Uses maintenance-free motor bearings, reduction gear, and couplings.
sentences.chinese: 使用無需維護的馬達軸承，變速器，聯軸節。

sentences.english: Install compression coupling in top float chamber tapping.
sentences.chinese: 在浮子腔接頭上安裝壓緊聯軸節。

sentences.english: In this paper, the vibration characteristics of rotors connected with a flanged coupling in textile machinery are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究紡織機械中具有凸緣聯軸節的轉子的振動特性。

sentences.english: The input shaft and output shaft of this kind of double universal couplings are non-parallel, non-intersecting.
sentences.chinese: 這種聯軸節的輸入軸與輸出軸成空間交錯軸關係。
